Title: Choosing the One
Description:
I have examined each egg, $n. Out of the lot that you brought me, I have chosen the three eggs with the most promise.

You may choose only one egg to take with you. Are you ready to make your final selection?
ObjectivesText: Speak to Instructor Tong at Windward Isle in the Jade Forest.
RewardText:
You may choose only one egg to take with you.

Choose carefully. There is no going back.
